long_description: This E-Gel saddle from Serfas is the ultimate in comfort for cruiser-style bikes---its classic wide shape provides maximum support. See-through anatomic base eliminates pressure in sensitive areas. Dual Density Base technology absorbs shock and allows the base to flex in critical areas. E-Gel is slow to rebound, offering firm yet comfortable support. Elastomer spring suspension system soaks up the bumps.
short_description: This E-Gel saddle from Serfas is the ultimate in comfort for cruiser-style bikes---its classic wide shape provides maximum support.
